subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Davis Love III is back on top at Harbour Town. Love, the five-time tournament champion, shot a five-under-par 66 for a share of the first-round lead in the Verizon Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C. He is tied with Justin Leonard and Lucas Glover.
snippet: Davis Love III is back on top at Harbour Town. Love, the five-time tournament champion, shot a five-under-par 66 for a share of the first-round lead in the Verizon Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C. He is tied with Justin Leonard and Lucas Glover.
